result.eng: The problem was growing from year to year.
result.ga: Bhí an fhadhb ag fás ó bhliain go bliain
result.orig: Bhí an fhadhb ag fás ó bhliain go bliain
result.html: Bhí an fhadhb ag fás ó bhliain go bliainThe problem was growing from year to year.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an ḟaḋb ag fás ó ḃliain go bliainThe problem was growing from year to year.

result.eng: The number of university students is growing.
result.ga: Tá líon na mac léinn ollscoile ag dul i méid
result.orig: Tá líon na mac léinn ollscoile ag dul i méid
result.html: Tá líon na mac léinn ollscoile ag dul i méidThe number of university students is growing.
result.ponchtml: Tá líon na mac léinn ollscoile ag dul i méidThe number of university students is growing.

result.eng: Of course, some of them were as boring as watching blue mould growing on a piece of bread.
result.ga: Ar ndóigh bhí cuid acu chomh leamh le bheith ag amharc ar mhúscán gorm ag fás ar phíosa aráin
result.orig: Ar ndóigh bhí cuid acu chomh leamh le bheith ag amharc ar mhúscán gorm ag fás ar phíosa aráin
result.html: Ar ndóigh bhí cuid acu chomh leamh le bheith ag amharc ar mhúscán gorm ag fás ar phíosa aráinOf course, some of them were as boring as watching blue mould growing on a piece of bread.
result.ponchtml: Ar ndóiġ ḃí cuid acu ċoṁ leaṁ le ḃeiṫ ag aṁarc ar ṁúscán gorm ag fás ar ṗíosa aráinOf course, some of them were as boring as watching blue mould growing on a piece of bread.

result.eng: She was growing up to be a girl.
result.ga: Bhí sí ag teannadh aníos ar a bheith ina cailín
result.orig: Bhí sí ag teannadh aníos ar a bheith ina cailín
result.html: Bhí sí ag teannadh aníos ar a bheith ina cailínShe was growing up to be a girl.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sí ag teannaḋ aníos ar a ḃeiṫ ina cailínShe was growing up to be a girl.
